div.p: Following use cases describe the componentâ€™s behavior as it responds to a series of related requests from the user.
Description:Uploading a File / Content to System

blockquote.blockquote: Logged in or Allowed.
1. User or Component POST a binary file or XML data of any domain entity.
2. ACL validates the request.
3. Backend system, using the workflow, sends the binary file to Meta Data extractor. Metadata extractor gives a metadata xml.
4. Copy of meta xml sends to search engine for indexing.
5. Binary file and meta xml files are sent to Data Management System for storage.

div.p: Description:Retrieving a file from the system

blockquote.blockquote: Logged in or Allowed.
1. User or Component requests a file url.
2. ACL validates the request.
3. Backend system, using the workflow , fetches the appropriate content from Data Management System.
Logged in or Allowed.
1. User or Component post the XML content for updating.
2. ACL validates the request.
3. Backend system, using the workflow, Fetches the appropriate content from the Data management system.
4. Merge the posted content with the retrieved data.
5. Send the merged content to search engine for re-indexing.
6. Send the merged content to Data Management System for storage.

div.p: Description:Deleting a file from the system storage

blockquote.blockquote: Logged in or Allowed.
1. User or Component makes a DELETE request for a file url.
2. Backend system, using the workflow, sends a request to search engine to delete the indexed content.
3. Sends the delete request to Data management system.
